ygData.subject: Re: Classic
ygData.msgSnippet: Greg: I would have to agree with the NO WAY vote...I started as a brand newbie before guild lobby was invented and it really sucks when ur corpse is stuck at
ygData.messageBody:
Greg:
I would have to agree with the "NO WAY" vote...I started as a brand
newbie before guild lobby was invented and it really sucks when ur
corpse is stuck at the bottom of a massive mob area and there is no
one around to come bail you out of the mess. :(


Tartracheon
Maelin Starpyre




--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Greg" <freechylde@y...> wrote:
>
> Hey Kids...Been gone awhile...been busy..
>
> Anyway, in talking to my old EQ chums and with what I read on the
> websites, there is/has been some talk about SOE making a "classic"
> server.
>
> Now the "classic" server would be EQ prior to PoP, no adds or toys,
> with the exception of the stuff necessary. This would mean no PoK,
no
> Guild Lobby, etc.
>
> Knowing that many of you have been here since around Beta or just
after
> and that most of you can honestly say " I remember when... or Back
in
> the Day we had to run from X t Y and it was 4 day run...."; I am
> curious to know if any of you kids would use such a server, or have
you
> all become stuck on how things are now that going back to the old
way
> would kill the game for you?
>
> As always, but now just plainly nosey..
>
> Greg
>
